name: BabySleepMachine
0:
”Alexa, open baby sleep machine”
”Alexa, start baby sleep machine”
”Alexa, launch baby sleep machine”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baby sleep machine
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Is your baby having a hard time falling asleep?
Give Baby Sleep Machine a try.

Baby Sleep Machine has several tracks of mellow, relaxing, soothing white noise you can listen to when you or your baby are having a hard time sleeping.
White noise, brown noise, pink noise, hairdryer, water sounds, wind sounds.

Just open the skill, and one of the white noise tracks will play continuously for 2 hours.

If you want to try an alternate track, just say, "Alexa next" or "Alexa, previous" to load another white noise track.

Sweet Dreams!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
